subject: feat: reorganize tones by function and improve chat interface
body:
- Reorganize 37 tones into 29 tones across 4 functional categories:
  - How I Feel (emotional state): neutral, happy, sad, etc.
  - What I Mean (intent): joking, serious, sincere, venting, etc.
  - How I'm Saying It (delivery): casual, direct, gentle, etc.
  - My Energy (intensity): calm, excited, urgent, hesitant, bold
- Add tone descriptions shown on hover (web) / long-press (native)
- Add ChatHeaderMenu with quick actions: edit name, copy code, share, end chat
- Improve SettingsModal for desktop (centered card, X close button)
- Add updateChatDisplayName() service function
- Update documentation
